ngl_inbox.title: Anonymous Messages
ngl_inbox.subtitle: Messages sent to you anonymously

secrets.create_secret_desc: Create a self-destructing message that burns after reading
secrets.share_carefully: Share this link carefully. It can only be opened once.
secrets.self_destruct_notice: This secret will self-destruct after being read once OR after the timer expires - whichever comes first. Make sure your recipient is ready!
secrets.warning_notice: This link will self-destruct after being opened once, or after {minutes} minutes - whichever comes first. The recipient should be ready to read it immediately.
secrets.placeholder: Type your secret here... passwords, love notes, jokes, anything!
secrets.write_message: Write your message. Once read, it burns forever.
secrets.message_auto_delete: Message will auto-delete after this time, even if unread
secrets.empty_message_desc: Please enter a secret message first.
secrets.create_error: Failed to create secret message. Please try again.

secret_page.waiting_desc: Someone has shared a secret message with you
secret_page.warning_desc: This message will self-destruct immediately after you read it. Make sure you're ready!
secret_page.message_revealed_desc: This message has been destroyed and cannot be viewed again
secret_page.not_found_desc: This secret link is invalid, expired, or has already been viewed
secret_page.read_carefully: Read carefully - this will disappear soon
secret_page.destroyed_forever: This message has been destroyed forever ðŸ”¥

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account and preferences
settings.profile_settings_desc: Manage your account and customize your Whispr experience
settings.privacy_desc: Your data is encrypted and secure
settings.no_tracking: No tracking or analytics on messages
settings.display_name_desc: This is how others will see your name
settings.username_desc: Lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores only
settings.invalid_username_desc: Username must be at least 3 characters long.
settings.username_unavailable_desc: This username is already taken. Please choose another.
settings.profile_updated_desc: Your profile has been saved successfully.
settings.share_link_desc: Share this link to receive anonymous messages:
settings.share_link_help: Anyone with this link can send you anonymous messages. Share it on social media, in your bio, or with friends!
settings.email_notifications_desc: Get notified when you receive new messages
settings.public_profile_desc: Allow others to find your NGL link
settings.danger_zone_desc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
settings.delete_account_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
settings.account_deleted_desc: Your account has been permanently deleted.
settings.delete_account_error: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
settings.failed_to_load: Failed to load profile. Please try again.

features.anonymous_desc: Send and receive messages without revealing identity
features.secure_desc: End-to-end encryption keeps your messages safe
features.self_destruct_desc: Messages disappear after reading or expiration
